metadata.title: K-Rim Car | Luxury Car Rental & Professional Car Wash Services
metadata.description: Discover luxury car rental and professional car wash services with K-Rim Car. Premium vehicles, exceptional service, and unmatched quality.
metadata.keywords: luxury car rental, premium car wash, car rental services, professional car wash, luxury cars Morocco, K-Rim Car Tangier

0.title: The Experience
0.description: High-end car rental and premium wash services for a truly exclusive experience.

1.title: Feel
1.description: Discover our collection of premium vehicles accompanied by fully personalized service.

2.title: Your
2.subtitle: Premium
2.description: Elegance, comfort, and performance combined for an unforgettable experience.

about.title: The Art of Luxury, Mastered to Perfection
about.description1: K-Rim Car is your reference for high-end car rental and professional detailing services. We provide established expertise and a true culture of excellence to offer superior level services.
about.description2: Our commitment to quality, attention to detail, and customer focus has made K-Rim Car a trusted partner for demanding clients looking for truly impeccable service.

features.exp: Over 10 years of expertise serving luxury

services.title: Excellence Services Designed For You
services.subtitle: Discover the perfect alliance of luxury, professionalism, and high-end service.

rental.title: Luxury Car Rental
rental.description: Explore our carefully selected high-end fleet. Ideal for business trips, prestigious events, or simply enjoying the pleasure of driving an exceptional vehicle.

wash.title: Professional Car Wash
wash.description: A professional wash and detailing service designed to preserve the shine, value, and elegance of your vehicle, with high-end products and expert techniques.

catalog.subtitle: Choose from our selection of premium vehicles, each maintained to the highest standards

pricing.title: High-End Wash and Detailing Packages
pricing.subtitle: Services designed to enhance and protect your exceptional vehicle.

express.name: Express Wash
express.desc: Effective exterior cleaning, ideal for restoring shine in a few minutes.

premium.name: Premium Detailing
premium.desc: Complete interior + exterior cleaning, performed with professional precision.

luxe.name: Luxury Package
luxe.desc: The most complete detailing treatment for a showroom finish.

testimonials.title: Client Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Discover real reviews from our clients in Morocco. K-Rim Car is rated 4.9/5 thanks to its premium service, new cars, and fast delivery in Tangier.

0.text: Impeccable service, very clean car. I highly recommend K-Rim Car for their professionalism.

1.text: Stress-free rental experience. I rented a Range Rover, it was in perfect condition. Thanks to the whole team.

2.text: Best agency in Casablanca. Punctuality and customer service on top. I will return without hesitation.

3.text: Very fair prices for luxury cars. The staff is welcoming and very helpful.

4.text: I appreciated the transparency and quality of service. No hidden fees, everything is clear from the start.

form.title: Book the
form.subtitle: Fill in the details below to confirm your booking via WhatsApp.
form.name: Full Name
form.disclaimer: You will be redirected to a WhatsApp conversation with our team to finalize your booking.

contact.title: Contact Us Today
contact.subtitle: Contact K-Rim Car, your premium car rental agency in Tangier. We offer fast, reliable service available for delivery to the airport, Tangier Ville station, hotels, and Malabata.
contact.cta: Have any questions? We are here to help. Contact us and let's discuss how we can serve you.

footer.description: Premium car rental & professional car wash services. Excellence, luxury, and transparency for all your travels in Tangier.
